title: FAMI (First Metro Asset Management, Inc.) — Account Opening Form

fields.label: Type of Account
fields.summary: Tick one: • Individual • Joint (OR) • Joint (AND) • In-Trust-For (ITF) • Corporate/Institution.

fields.label: Fund/s to Open
fields.summary: Tick the mutual fund(s) you want (e.g., Equity, Balanced, Fixed Income). If multiple, tick all that apply.

fields.label: Account Currency
fields.summary: Tick PHP or USD (as allowed by the chosen fund).

fields.label: Initial Investment Amount
fields.summary: Write amount in figures (PHP or USD, same as currency ticked).

fields.label: Full Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle (match valid ID); add Suffix if any.

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Place of Birth
fields.summary: Write City/Municipality and Province/Country.

fields.label: Citizenship / Nationality
fields.summary: Write nationality (e.g., Filipino). For dual citizens/aliens, attach supporting ID(s).

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Tick: Single • Married • Widowed • Separated/Annulled • Divorced.

fields.label: Mother’s Maiden Name
fields.summary: Write full maiden name (for verification/KYC).

fields.label: TIN
fields.summary: Write 9–12 digit TIN (if none, write N/A).

fields.label: SSS/GSIS No.
fields.summary: Write SSS or GSIS number (if available).

fields.label: Present/Residential Address
fields.summary: Write full address with ZIP. If different from permanent, fill both.

fields.label: Permanent Address
fields.summary: Write full address with ZIP; write SAME AS PRESENT if same.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.summary: Write active personal email (used for statements/confirmations).

fields.label: Mobile Number
fields.summary: Write active mobile number (PH format if local).

fields.label: Residence Phone
fields.summary: Write landline with area code or N/A.

sections.title: Investor Information — Co-Investor / Joint / ITF Details (If Applicable)

fields.label: Co-Investor Full Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle; add Suffix if any.

fields.label: Relationship to Primary
fields.summary: Write relationship (e.g., Spouse, Child, Parent, Business Partner).

fields.label: Date/Place of Birth
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY and City/Province/Country.

fields.label: Citizenship / Nationality
fields.summary: Write nationality; attach ID if foreign/dual.

fields.label: TIN / SSS/GSIS
fields.summary: Write TIN and SSS/GSIS (if available).

fields.label: Employment Status
fields.summary: Tick one: • Employed (Private) • Employed (Government) • Self-Employed/Business • Professional • OFW/Immigrant • Retired • Student • Homemaker • Others (specify).

fields.label: Employer / Business Name
fields.summary: Write company/business name; if none, write N/A.

fields.label: Occupation / Position
fields.summary: Write job title/role (e.g., Software Engineer, Store Owner).

fields.label: Employer / Business Address
fields.summary: Write full address with ZIP.

fields.label: Work Phone
fields.summary: Write office landline or N/A.

fields.label: Source of Funds
fields.summary: Tick/Write main source: • Salary • Business Income • Savings • Investment Proceeds • Pension/Remittance • Others (specify).

fields.label: Gross Annual Income
fields.summary: Tick/Write income band (e.g., < PHP 500k • PHP 500k–1M • PHP 1M–3M • > PHP 3M).

fields.label: Primary Objective
fields.summary: Tick one: • Capital Preservation • Income • Balanced • Growth • Aggressive Growth.

fields.label: Investment Horizon
fields.summary: Tick: • <1 yr • 1–3 yrs • 3–5 yrs • >5 yrs.

fields.label: Risk Appetite
fields.summary: Tick: • Conservative • Moderate • Moderately Aggressive • Aggressive.

fields.label: Settlement Bank Name
fields.summary: Write your bank (e.g., Metrobank, BDO, BPI).

fields.label: Branch
fields.summary: Write specific branch name/location.

fields.label: Account Name
fields.summary: Write exact account name (must match investor name for payouts).

fields.label: Account Number
fields.summary: Write full account number (check digits).

fields.label: Monthly Investment Program
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, write amount, frequency (e.g., monthly), and start date.

fields.label: Scheduled Redemption
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, write amount/frequency and settlement account.

fields.label: Delivery of Statements
fields.summary: Tick preferred delivery: • Email • Pick-up • Courier (fees may apply).

fields.label: US Person
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide US TIN and complete W-9; if No but with US indicia, complete W-8 form.

fields.label: Other Tax Residency
fields.summary: List countries of tax residence and corresponding TINs; if no TIN, state reason per CRS rules.

fields.label: Beneficiary Name
fields.summary: Write full name as on valid ID.

fields.label: Relationship
fields.summary: Write relationship (e.g., Spouse, Child, Parent).

fields.label: Contact & Address
fields.summary: Write mobile and full address.

fields.label: Primary ID
fields.summary: Tick ID type (e.g., PhilID, UMID, Passport, Driver’s License, SSS/GSIS) and write ID number.

fields.label: Secondary ID (if required)
fields.summary: Tick ID type and write ID number. Attach clear copies with 3 specimen signatures if requested.

fields.label: Warranty of Information
fields.summary: Confirm all information is true, correct, and updated; agree to notify FAMI of any changes.

fields.label: Data Privacy Consent
fields.summary: Consent to collection/processing/sharing of data for account servicing and legal/regulatory purposes.

fields.label: Risk Disclosure Acknowledgment
fields.summary: Acknowledge NAVPS/NAVPU may go up or down; returns are not guaranteed; PDIC does not insure mutual funds.

fields.label: Email/Fax/Online Instructions
fields.summary: Agree that properly identified electronic/faxed instructions are valid and binding.

fields.label: Signatures
fields.summary: Sign over printed name(s); write date (MM/DD/YYYY). For joint accounts, all required signatories must sign.
